## Setup

First time

```{r, eval = FALSE}
Sys.setenv(DOWNLOAD_STATIC_LIBV8 = 1)
renv::restore()
rgee::ee_Authenticate()
rgee::ee_Initialize()
```

## System dependencies

- gcloud

### `rgee` 

Install:

- `rgee` (https://r-spatial.github.io/rgee/articles/rgee01.html#installation)
- gcloud (https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/install)

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(rgee)
ee_install(py_env = 'rgee')
```


Authenticate:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
ee_Initialize()
```


Check:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
ee_check()
```


Renv + python:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
renv::use_python(reticulate::py_discover_config()$python)
renv::snapshot()
```
